amendment.description: Amendment provides $79 million for the Small Business Administration's 7(a) loan program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to restore funding for the SBA 7(a) program in order to maintain the funding level from the previous fiscal year.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Manzullo amendment (A001) Agreed to by recorded vote: 281 - 137 (Roll no. 328).
